import React from "react"; import phoneIcon from '../phone-square-alt-solid.svg' import locationIcon from '../map-marker-alt-solid.svg' import emailIcon from '../envelope-square-solid.svg' import { useRef } from "react"; const ContactMe = () => { const formRef = useRef() const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (

Let's discuss your projects

As a fresh new developer i'm looking for an unpaid job wich can improve my skills and benefit to you also

Hoping to work in real world applications

Let's do that by the contact method of your choice

); }; export default ContactMe;
